description:
The oslo-config dependency referenced in pip-requires should be updated to the latest version:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/tools/pip-requires#L30

https://github.com/openstack/oslo-config/blob/master/oslo/config/cfg.py

This is needed to move specific driver options from the DEFAULT group w/o losing backwards compatibility.
title: oslo-config dependency should be updated to support deprecated_group

comments.content:
The oslo-config dependency referenced in pip-requires should be updated to the latest version:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/tools/pip-requires#L30

https://github.com/openstack/oslo-config/blob/master/oslo/config/cfg.py 

This is needed to move specific driver options from the DEFAULT group w/o loosing backwards compatibility.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti

comments.content:
Here's a patchset currently stuck due to the missing "deprecated_group" argument:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/23352/1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti

comments.content: http://tarballs.openstack.org/oslo-config/oslo-config-2013.1b5.tar.gz is now available. This has the deprecated_group support
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content:
Tx Mark,

can you please update the pip-requires in Nova? I cannot pass Jenkins w/o it :-)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/23449
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/23449
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/15419ceaf0d9a12d38387349f09d7d8c88f74bf5
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 15419ceaf0d9a12d38387349f09d7d8c88f74bf5
Author: Alessandro Pilotti <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Mar 4 20:57:00 2013 +0200

    Fixes oslo-config update for deprecated_group
    
    Fixes bug: 1140310
    
    The oslo-config dependency referenced in pip-requires should be updated to
    the latest version to include support for "deprecated_group".
    This is needed to move specific driver options from the DEFAULT group w/o
    losing backwards compatibility.
    
    Change-Id: I5d18a5ee704a1f781c8acd6f903b0e3ca07bc070
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
